backend.title: Backend Development
backend.desc: Experienced in building robust server-side applications and RESTful APIs, with a strong foundation in object-oriented design. Skilled in PostgreSQL and MySQL for efficient database integration and optimization, and proficient in frameworks like Spring Boot and Ruby on Rails. Developed scalable, production-grade applications in Ruby and Java within Agile environments.

front.title: Frontend Development
front.desc: Experienced in SSR and CSR implementation for seamless user interaction and optimized performance. Proficient in Svelte and JavaScript, with commercial exposure, and experienced in developing reusable components using React. A solid understanding of JavaScript fundamentals and modern language features allows me to build responsive, accessible, and scalable front-end code with a strong emphasis on detail and usability.

devOps.title: DevOps
devOps.desc: Streamlined the development process through automation, continuous integration, and continuous delivery using industry-standard tools and platforms
